question: Which leading firm has recently acquired majority stake in Cygnus Medicare?
explanation: Leading media firm Amar Ujala Ltd has acquired a majority stake in Cygnus Medicare, which operates a chain of super specialty hospitals, for around Rs 130 crore as part of its expansion plans in the healthcare segment. Cygnus Medicare currently has more than 1,000 beds across its 10 super specialty hospitals in Delhi and Haryana.
